column5: Check this out!!!  I think it's pretty cool...now should that pike be tracked down ?
I think i'd have one pair of pants that would need to be changed thats for sure!

I don't think he was familiar with handling Pike or how ill tempered they can be. I'll bet that bite leaves a mark that won't soon go away, just think of all the little teeth that broke off in there and the infection that probably set in!
That should remind him why not to use live bait when hand fishing! LOL  That's going to leave a mark.
GCD you might want to see your eye doctor soonÂ ,lol . The pike that bite him was going after the fish he was releasing. I know you are getting old but you aren't that old yet or are you.
lol that was awesome.  i can see the pike down in the weeds telling all his pike buddies how he bit back lol  CHeers!
Looked to me like he was noodling for pike or sharks ar whatever.Them overgrown minnows are nothin but bait for real fish!
Do you know where i can buy a bait with hand attached to it.  I hear pike love them.

Apparently the same thing just happened , this past Thursday night in Dokis Bay on the French River, a couple of kids were fishing at the dock .. the kid was releasing a Smallie and a Muskie came and grabbed him by the hand and wrist , I was told that he's pretty mangled up. and will require physio for some nerve damage. I called my buddy Bud who owns the place where It happend , he confirmed that it's true, It was his nephew and little cousin 12 & 14.
